subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Citing health problems, Billy Gillispie has resigned as the head coach of Texas Tech’s men’s basketball team, ending disappointing one-year tenure that included allegations of player mistreatment.
snippet: Citing health problems, Billy Gillispie has resigned as the head coach of Texas Tech’s men’s basketball team, ending disappointing one-year tenure that included allegations of player mistreatment.
